Lime green Hand-printed Vishnupuri Silk

Rs.5,199/-

MRP inclusive of all taxes

Colour:

New Arrival — Handcrafted Luxury Saree

A premium handloom saree crafted in a refreshing lotus-green tone, featuring intricate floral motifs in soft white and rose-pink. Woven by skilled artisans, this saree blends tradition with modern elegance. Lightweight, flowy, and perfect for festive, occasion wear, or premium photoshoots.

Net Quantity: 1 N
Common Generic Name: Women's Saree
Concept: LOOM SAGA — Heritage Handloom Collection

Description:

Colour: Lotus Green with White & Pink Handwoven Floral Motifs
Fabric: Pure Handloom Silk-Cotton Blend
Design:

  • All-over floral vines in contrast white
  • Pink lotus-inspired buttas along the border
  • Elegant pallu with heightened woven detailing
  • Subtle sheen with lightweight drape
  • Soft texture suitable for all-day comfort
Blouse Piece: Unstitched matching blouse in same lotus-green colour (approx. 80 cm)

Size & Measurements (Approx.)

Saree Length: 5.5 meters
Blouse Piece Length: 0.8 meters
Width: 1.12 meters
Weight: Approx. 450–500 g (Lightweight)
Fit: Free size — drapes naturally on all body types

Craft & Detailing

  • Handloom woven by artisans using traditional techniques
  • Floral motifs inspired by classical Indian temple architecture
  • High-quality yarn ensures long-lasting colour and durability
  • Smooth fall for elegant pleating
Read More

Fabric Composition: 60% Silk, 40% Cotton (Handloom Silk-Cotton Blend)

Zari: Copper-toned zari threading on pallu and border

Dyes: Eco-friendly, azo-free dyes ensuring skin safety

Weave: Traditional handloom weave with intricate jacquard detailing

  • Dry clean recommended for first wash
  • Hand wash separately in cold water with mild detergent
  • Do not bleach or wring
  • Dry in shade, away from direct sunlight
  • Iron on low heat on reverse side
  • Store in a cool, dry place wrapped in muslin cloth

Delivery

  • Free shipping on orders above Rs.999
  • Standard delivery: 5-7 business days
  • Express delivery available at additional cost

Payment Options

  • Credit/Debit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, RuPay)
  • UPI (Google Pay, PhonePe, Paytm)
  • Net Banking
  • Cash on Delivery (select locations)

Returns & Exchange

  • 7-day easy return policy
  • Product must be unused with original tags
  • Contact customer care for return pickup
